tool_description: Experience the power of efficient, targeted, and personalized SMS communication with Zigatext.
name: Zigatext - Global Bulk SMS & OTP
title: Zigatext - Global Bulk SMS & OTP

api_list.name: Fetch Months
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zigatext-global-bulk-sms-otp1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/third-party/months"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zigatext-global-bulk-sms-otp1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Add Single Birthday Contact
Bulk Subscribers Opt-in
Send Message
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zigatext-global-bulk-sms-otp1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/third-party/messages/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zigatext-global-bulk-sms-otp1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
